column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: Contents of property
This  property  indicates  the  ON/OFF status.
Door open/close status
Door open warning status
column4: Door open warning found = 0x41 Door open warning not found = 0x42

column3: Used to acquire the status (i.e. open or closed) of the refrigerator compartment door.
Used to acquire the status (i.e. open or closed) of the freezer compartment door.
Used to acquire the status (i.e. open or closed) of the ice compartment door.
Used to acquire the status (i.e. open or closed) of the vegetable compartment door.
Used to acquire the status (i.e. open or closed) of the multi-refrigerating mode compartment door.
Used to acquire the maximum allowable temperature setting levels for the individual compartments of the refrigerator.
column4: First byte: Refrigerator compartment Second byte: Freezer compartment Third byte: subzero-fresh compartment Fourth byte: Vegetable compartment Fifth byte: Multi-refrigerating mode compartment Sixth to eighth bytes: Reserved for future use. 0x01.0xFF (Level 1.255) 0x00 = no compartment

column3: Used to specify the refrigerator compartment temperature in °C, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the freezer compartment temperature in °C, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the ice compartment temperature in °C, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the vegetable compartment temperature in °C, and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Multi-refrigera- ting mode compartment temperature setting
column3: Used to specify the multi-refrigerating mode compartment temperature in °C, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the refrigerator compartment temperature by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to maximum allowable temperature setting level (highest to lowest temperature)

column3: Used to specify the freezer compartment temperature by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to maximum allowable temperature setting level (highest to lowest temperature)

column3: Used to specify ice compartment temperature by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to maximum allowable temperature setting level (highest to lowest temperature)

column3: Used to specify the vegetable compartment temperature by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to maximum allowable temperature setting level (highest to lowest temperature)

column2: Multi-refrigera- ting mode compartment temperature level setting
column3: Used to specify the multi-refrigerating mode compartment temperature by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to maximum allowable temperature setting level (highest to lowest temperature)

column3: Used to acquire the measured refrigerator compartment temperature (°C).
Used to acquire the measured freezer compartment temperature (°C).
Used to acquire the measured meat and fish compartment temperature (°C).
Used to acquire the measured vegetable compartment temperature (°C).

column2: Measured multi-refrigeratin g mode compartment temperature
column3: Used to acquire the measured multi-refrigerating mode compartment temperature (°C).
Used to acquire the rotation speed of the compressor. The rotation speed is expressed in terms of a level.
column4: First byte: Maximum rotation speed L (0x01.0xFF (1.255)) Second byte: Rotation speed of the actual compressor: 0x00 to L (zero speed to highest speed)

column3: Used to acquire the measured electric current consumption.
Used to acquire the rated power consumption.
Used to specify whether or not to use the “Quick freeze” function of the refrigerator, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: “Normal operation” mode: 0x41 “Quick freeze” mode: 0x42 “Standby for fast freezing” mode: 0x43

column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the “quick refrigeration” function of the refrigerator, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: “Normal operation” mode: 0x41 “Quick refrigeration” mode: 0x42 “Standby for quick refrigeration” mode: 0x43

column3: Used to specify whether or not to enable the automatic icemaker of the refrigerator, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: “Enable icemaker” option: 0x41 “Disable icemaker” option: 0x42 “Temporarily disable icemaker” option: 0x43

column3: Used to acquire the status of the automatic icemaker of the refrigerator.
Used to acquire the status of the tank of the automatic icemaker of the refrigerator in terms of whether it contains water or not.
column4: Icemaker tank contains water: 0x41 There is no water left in the icemaker tank or the icemaker tank has not been positioned correctly in the refrigerator: 0x42

column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the refrigerator compartment humidification function, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify whether or not to use the vegetable compartment humidification function, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify whether or not to use the deodorization function of the refrigerator, and to acquire the current setting.
